channel.title: Npc error rep++.. help badly?
channel.description: never mind.. fixed it.. but now i got a diff error to fix every time i attack an npc, it drops nothing.. [code][7/5/11 12:07 PM]: [player-1]: Fatal: couldn't find connection vertex! Droppingpacket. [/code]

item.title: Npc error rep++.. help badly?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

ye changed but still get this…

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2633: illegal start of expression public void followPlayer(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2633: illegal start of expression public void followPlayer(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2633: ';' expected public void followPlayer(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2633: <identifier> expected public void followPlayer(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2633: not a statement public void followPlayer(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2633: ';' expected public void followPlayer(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2721: illegal start of expression public void follownpc(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2721: illegal start of expression public void follownpc(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2721: ';' expected public void follownpc(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2721: <identifier> expected public void follownpc(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2721: not a statement public void follownpc(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2721: ';' expected public void follownpc(int i, int playerId) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2805: illegal start of expression public boolean checkClipping(int i) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2805: ';' expected public boolean checkClipping(int i) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2805: ';' expected public boolean checkClipping(int i) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2818: illegal start of expression private Client v; ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2819: illegal start of expression public NPCHandler(Client Client) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2819: ')' expected public NPCHandler(Client Client) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2819: illegal start of expression public NPCHandler(Client Client) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2819: ';' expected public NPCHandler(Client Client) { ^

item.title: Npc error rep++.. help badly?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:9, topic:402522”]well i added this under the followplayer, where the first error was at.

public boolean followPlayer(int i) { switch (npcs[i].npcType) { if (npcs[i] != null) { case 2892: case 2894: return false; } return true; }

Don’t think i added it right, because i got these errors

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ 10 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

Yes, you added it in the wrong place.[quote=“zyle1992, post:8, topic:402522”]add a simple null check before the switch statement.

if (npcs[i] != null) { switch (npcs[i].npcType) { // ... } } [/code[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Npc error rep++.. help badly?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

well i added this under the followplayer, where the first error was at.

public boolean followPlayer(int i) { switch (npcs[i].npcType) { if (npcs[i] != null) { case 2892: case 2894: return false; } return true; }

Don’t think i added it right, because i got these errors

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2625: case, default, or '}' expected if (npcs[i] != null) { ^ 10 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Npc error rep++.. help badly?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

A simple way would be to remove the comments you made, and then add a simple null check before the switch statement.

if (npcs[i] != null) {
    switch (npcs[i].npcType) {
        // ...
    }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Npc error rep++.. help badly?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:402522”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=499580.msg3653615#msg3653615 date=1309889731]
Well the problem is hidden… and i got no idea what i did wrong or where i added something wrong… and cbf to look for it, since i got this problem now…
[/quote]

That problem is probably caused by the fact that the previous problem wasn’t fixed.

Think about it this way. You go into the emergency room because you have a gash down the length of your leg. The doctors put a bandage on it and send you home. A week later, you have dead tissue accumulating on the gash because you now have an infection.

If the doctor would have fixed the first problem, the second wouldn’t have happened.[/quote]

Daamn… that could be it, but how would i fix it the first problem then?

Read full topic

Think about it this way. You go into the emergency room because you have a gash down the length of your leg. The doctors put a bandage on it and send you home. A week later, you have dead tissue accumulating on the gash because you now have an infection.

If the doctor would have fixed the first problem, the second wouldn’t have happened.

item.title: Npc error rep++.. help badly?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:1, topic:402522”]Well, i know i’ve posted this numerous times, but i need help with this. Here’s the error when i summon an npc, and i get dced.

[7/5/11 11:59 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [7/5/11 11:59 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.followPlayer(NPCHandler.java:2624) [7/5/11 11:59 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.followPlayer(NPCHandler.java:2643) [7/5/11 11:59 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.Summon(NPCHandler.java:68) [7/5/11 11:59 AM]: at server.model.players.skills.Summoning.SummonNewNPC(Summoning.java:864) [7/5/11 11:59 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.initialize(Client.java:1058) [7/5/11 11:59 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:186) [7/5/11 11:59 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:173)

npchandler.java 2624

npchandler.java2643

npchanlder.java 68

i even tried to take out the // and it did same thing…
summoning.java 864

client.java 1058

playerhandler.java 186

and server.java 173

You can group lines that are close together, and in the same source file in one block of code.

I believe the problem is that npcs at index i is null.

Read full topic
